newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai markets to close April 14-15 for holidays.
newsitem.headline: Thai markets to close April 14-15 for holidays.

text.p: Thailand's stock market, banks and finance firms will be closed from April 14-15 for the traditional Thai New Year holidays, a Stock Exchange of Thailand (SET) official said on Thursday.
The markets will reopen on April 16, she told Reuters.
The government said its offices would be closed from April 14-16.
